name: One Two Smash: Tanoshii Tennis
overview: In this cute tennis game up to 2 players to play in a cooperative or vs mode. Different kind of courts and a single or double game modes. The game doesn't feature real players or tournaments. But depending of the players standing position and the button pressed the player can make more than 50 different shots. There are different game modes: In knockout the player have to beat 3 different computer players to win. 2 Players can play in battle mode. There are 12 different characters to choose each of them with different abilities.
